  • Classes in simple.gui used by simple.gui 
    Class and Description
    CustomDraw
    Interface intended to be used as a way to customize how drawing is done on widgets.
    DrawModule
    Class with methods for drawing to a Graphics2D object and manipulating colors.
    Image
    Object that works as an overhead for the BufferedImage object.
    ImageBox 
    TextArea 
    TextArea.Alignment 
    TextBox 
    Vector
    The Vector class simply holds two double values, x and y, and has a variety of ways to manipulate them.
